title: Aunt Mayme's Hot Shrimp Dip
description: Impress guests at your Kentucky Derby party by serving this quick and easy hot shrimp dip appetizer that's ready in minutes.

About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE Recipes Appetizers and Snacks Dips and Spreads Recipes Shrimp Dip Recipes Aunt Mayme's Hot Shrimp Dip 3.0 (1) 1 Review 2 Photos Aunt Mayme made this appetizer every year for more than 20 years for her Kentucky Derby Day party. Submitted by corbettcook Published on December 27, 2017 Save Rate Print Share Close Add Photo Prep Time: 5 mins Cook Time: 5 mins Total Time: 10 mins Servings: 8 Yield: 8 servings Jump to Nutrition Facts Cook Mode (Keep screen awake) Ingredients 1x 2x 4x Oops! Something went wrong. Our team is working on it. Original recipe (1X) yields 8 servings 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese 1 (4.5 ounce) can small shrimp, drained ¼ cup mayonnaise 3 teaspoons dry sherry 1 teaspoon prepared yellow mustard 1 teaspoon grated onion 1 dash seasoned salt Directions Melt cream cheese in the top of a double boiler. Stir in shrimp, mayonnaise, sherry, mustard, onion, and seasoned salt until combined. name: corbettcook
instructions: Melt cream cheese in the top of a double boiler. Stir in shrimp, mayonnaise, sherry, mustard, onion, and seasoned salt until combined.
